body:
Hi All,

This is just a friendly reminder that the deadline for abstract
submissions to the Radiance workshop is today, Sept. 12:

http://www.dtc.umn.edu/cgi-bin/seminars/symposia/radiance.php

Even if you only plan to attend, we ask you to register before the
end of the week, so we can get a reasonable head count.  Through
Katja's hard work and the generosity of the UMN Digital Technology
Center and other sponsors, we have funding for two invited speakers:

Roland Fleming of MPI T?bingen, who will speak on Material Perception
<http://www.kyb.mpg.de/~roland>

Susan Ubbelohde of Loisos & Ubbelohde, who will present some of her
daylighting analysis work
<http://www.coolshadow.com>

And of course I shall be there, talking about a new method I'm
working on to take advantage of BTDF measurements for complex
fenestration in daylighting and annual calculations.

Hope to see you there!
-Greg
subject: [Radiance-general] Workshop abstract deadline is today
